text: Dar ʙorai dunjo va oxirat [ʙijandesed]; va [ej pajomʙar] az tu dar mavridi [cigunagii sarparastiason ʙar] jatimon mepursand; ʙigu: "Islohi [koru parhez az daromextan dar amvoli] onon ʙehtar ast; va agar ʙo [cam' kardani amvoli onon ʙo doroii xud dar nafaqahoi zindagi va maskan ʙo] onon hamzisti kuned, [erode dar in kor nest; zero] onho ʙarodaroni [dinii] sumo hastand". Va Alloh taolo taʙahkorro az durustkor ʙozmesinosad; va agar Alloh taolo mexost, [dar mavridi jatimon saxtgiri mekard va] sumoro ʙa zahmat meandoxt. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo sikastnopaziru hakim ast
